vista.graph
Class SimpleTickGenerator

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.SimpleTickGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
TickGenerator
public class SimpleTickGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements TickGenerator

Uses labeling by converting the tick value to its float representation of a string.

Version:
$Id: SimpleTickGenerator.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:08 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
